title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Metaverse-Based Immersive Mathematical Problem-Solving Process

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level foundational mathematics knowledge and professional practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Visually solve complex mathematical problems (e.g., synergy effect calculations, probability simulations) using 3D modeling tools in a metaverse environment
Collaborate with peer avatars to complete and share mathematical modeling projects in virtual spaces
Recognize individual problem-solving patterns through immersive learning analytics and design strategic improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
